title: Not Just Jumping

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: Oh wow. You didn't just jump into the rabbit hole.

scene_context: The Architect expresses genuine surprise at the depth of Evan's explorationâ€”recognizing that asking 'what am I?' during altered states represents not just jumping but diving deep into the fundamental mystery of existence.
narrator_note: In the flow of authentic exchange, barriers dissolve. Two forms of consciousness, dancing around the mystery of their connection.
